column4: Ddpbf> Yea, I think I need to uninstall the nvidia driver and reinstall
how exactlly did you install nvidia driver?
that points to graphics driver issue
oh, boy. So noonet told you that Nvidia 173 driver, that your card requires, doesn't work with Xorg in Natty?
not 100% sure. There is a newr 173 driver, just not that sure that it is in repoes right now.
it's the default nvidia driver in Ubuntu, free, but a lot less powerfull
you need to remove your current nvidia driver
ther must be some residual config file that was left after removing nvidia driver
sorry, needed a few more lines. please, sudo lspci -vnn |grep -A 10 VGA
